name: Yamifuku Natsu: Teito Monogatari Futatabi
overview: Yamifuku Natsu: Teito Monogatari Futatabi is an action adventure game in which the player controls a young student (Hiroshi Kimura) that get involved in some strange adventure when a night a strange man find the Spirit stone (a stone that allows a man to travel between the real world and the demon world) and he divide it in 3 parts in hide them in different locations. One stormy night of 1999 meanwhile in those places some demons appear in the streets of Tokyo Hiroshi is driving his motorbike he almost hit a man with a suitcase and a diskette that he carried falls to the floor. When Hiroshi tried to apologize the man got angry and leave, as soon as he leaves Hiroshi discover something on the floor, is the disk. He goes to his home and put the diskette in his computer and something strange happened he travels to the demon's world and got attacked by a demon samurai and he killed him. But the next morning when he wake up he decided to go to the temple when his friend lives and they start the adventure looking for the Spirit stone that is between this world and the demon's world. During the game the player will also controls other character like the girl (the friend of Hiroshi) and even a cat. There are some times during the game that the player have to use the spirit points to change between worlds and get new objects to advance in the adventure. There is also an energy bar that only appears in the demon's world and if that bar reaches zero the game ends.
